verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3927>Lemuel,<s%> the <S%H4853>prophecy<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3256>taught<s%> him.
What, <S%H4100><s%> my <S%H1248>son?<s%> and <S%H4100>what,<s%> the <S%H1248>son<s%> of my <S%H990>womb?<s%> and <S%H4100>what,<s%> the <S%H1248>son<s%> of my <S%H5088>vows?<s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H2428>strength<s%> unto <S%H802>women,<s%> nor thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> to that which <S%H4229>destroyeth<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

It is <S%H408>not<s%> for <S%H4428>kings,<s%> O <S%H3927>Lemuel,<s%> it is <S%H408>not<s%> for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine;<s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> for <S%H7336>princes<s%> strong drink: <S%H7941><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> they <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H2710>law,<s%> and <S%H8138>pervert<s%> the <S%H1779>judgment<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>afflicted.<s%> <S%H6040><s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> unto him that is ready to <S%H6>perish,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> unto those that be of <S%H4751>heavy<s%> <S%H5315>hearts.<s%>
Let him <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> his <S%H7389>poverty,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> his <S%H5999>misery<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for the <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> such as are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H2475>destruction.<s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> and plead the <S%H1777>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H2428>virtuous<s%> <S%H802>woman?<s%> for her <S%H4377>price<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> above <S%H4480>rubies.<s%> <S%H6443><s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband<s%> doth safely <S%H982>trust<s%> in her, so that he shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2637>need<s%> of <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>
She will <S%H1580>do<s%> him <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2416>life.<s%>
She <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> <S%H6785>wool,<s%> and <S%H6593>flax,<s%> and <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H2656>willingly<s%> with her <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
She <S%H1961>is<s%> like the <S%H5503>merchants'<s%> <S%H591>ships;<s%> she <S%H935>bringeth<s%> her <S%H3899>food<s%> from <S%H4480>afar.<s%> <S%H4801><s%>

She <S%H6965>riseth<s%> also while it is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2964>meat<s%> to her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and a <S%H2706>portion<s%> to her <S%H5291>maidens.<s%>
She <S%H2161>considereth<s%> a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3947>buyeth<s%> it: with the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of her <S%H3709>hands<s%> she <S%H5193>planteth<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
She <S%H2296>girdeth<s%> her <S%H4975>loins<s%> with <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and <S%H553>strengtheneth<s%> her <S%H2220>arms.<s%>
She <S%H2938>perceiveth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> her <S%H5216>candle<s%> goeth not <S%H3808>out<s%> <S%H3518><s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>
She <S%H7971>layeth<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H3601>spindle,<s%> and her <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> the <S%H6418>distaff.<s%>
She stretcheth <S%H6566>out<s%> her <S%H3709>hand<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> yea, she reacheth <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H34>needy.<s%>

She is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H4480>snow<s%> <S%H7950><s%> for her <S%H1004>household:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1004>household<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8144>scarlet.<s%>
She <S%H6213>maketh<s%> herself coverings of <S%H4765>tapestry;<s%> her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is <S%H8336>silk<s%> and <S%H713>purple.<s%>
Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> when he <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
She <S%H6213>maketh<s%> fine <S%H5466>linen,<s%> and <S%H4376>selleth<s%> it; and <S%H5414>delivereth<s%> <S%H2289>girdles<s%> unto the <S%H3669>merchant.<s%>
Strength <S%H5797><s%> and <S%H1926>honor<s%> are her <S%H3830>clothing;<s%> and she shall <S%H7832>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H314>come.<s%>
She <S%H6605>openeth<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> her <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>
She looketh <S%H6822>well<s%> to the <S%H1979>ways<s%> of her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6104>idleness.<s%>
Her <S%H1121>children<s%> arise <S%H6965>up,<s%> and call her <S%H833>blessed;<s%> her <S%H1167>husband<s%> also, and he <S%H1984>praiseth<s%> her.
Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2428>virtuously,<s%> but <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5927>excellest<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

Favor <S%H2580><s%> is <S%H8267>deceitful,<s%> and <S%H3308>beauty<s%> is <S%H1892>vain:<s%> but a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> shall be <S%H1984>praised.<s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> her of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of her <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and let her own <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> her in the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>
